subject: RE: [junit] SOAP and JUnit
msgSnippet: Use the text test runner, it doesn t use a fancy classloader. % junit.textui.TestRunner MyTestClass ... From: TH Lim [mailto:dct_thlim@jhancock.com.my] Sent:
messageBody:
Use the text test runner, it doesn't use a fancy classloader.

%> junit.textui.TestRunner MyTestClass

-----Original Message-----
From: TH Lim [mailto:dct_thlim@...]
Sent: 21 August 2001 03:48
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] SOAP and JUnit


Hi,

I am developed a Apahce SOAP 2.2 client and testing it with JUnit 3.7.
If I
run the test code alone, it is fine but if I run the test code under
JUnit
I get the exception included below. From what I see I think it has to
with
java permission so I set the security policy call to no permission
(allows
ALL). Yet, I still get the same exception. Is it some setting I need to
do
to JUnit or others classes that involved. Please advise. thank you.

java.lang.LinkageError: Class org/xml/sax/InputSource violates loader
constraints
